com.jbion.utils.progress

Enum BarStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BarStyle>
      • com.jbion.utils.progress.BarStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<BarStyle>

    public enum BarStyle
extends Enum<BarStyle>
    An enum representing the different possible styles for a AbstractProgressBar.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ASCII
      A progress bar made out of ASCII characters only.
      ASCII2
      A progress bar made out of ASCII characters only.
      BLOCK
      The progress bar is built with block characters.
      DOUBLE
      A progress bar in the shape of a horizontal double line, using box drawing characters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      char curr
      The char for the current last block of the progress.
      char done
      The char for the blocks representing the part that is done.
      char left
      The char for the bar's left bound.
      char right
      The char for the bar's right bound.It is located right under HeaderStyle.right.
      char todo
      The char for the blocks representing the part left to do.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ASCII

        public static final BarStyle ASCII
        A progress bar made out of ASCII characters only. Not adapted for the use with a header.

      • ASCII2

        public static final BarStyle ASCII2
        A progress bar made out of ASCII characters only. Decent in combination with HeaderStyle.LINE.

      • BLOCK

        public static final BarStyle BLOCK
        The progress bar is built with block characters. It looks like a full and growing rectangle.

      • DOUBLE

        public static final BarStyle DOUBLE
        A progress bar in the shape of a horizontal double line, using box drawing characters. Nice in combination with HeaderStyle.ANGLES.

    • Field Detail

      • left

        public final char left
        The char for the bar's left bound. It is located right under HeaderStyle.left.

      • done

        public final char done
        The char for the blocks representing the part that is done.

      • curr

        public final char curr
        The char for the current last block of the progress.

      • todo

        public final char todo
        The char for the blocks representing the part left to do.

      • right

        public final char right
        The char for the bar's right bound.It is located right under HeaderStyle.right.

      • values

        public static BarStyle[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (BarStyle c : BarStyle.values())
    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
